title: [Outside the Aviaries]
description: Water-smoothed pebbles of all colors are jumbled together to form a path that winds around the glass dome that encloses the aviaries.  Several tiny footbridges arch over the bends of a stream that meanders back and forth alongside the path.  Lush grass and several plantings of green bamboo add to the peaceful atmosphere created by the slow-moving water.

Water-smoothed pebbles of all colors are jumbled together to form a path that winds around the glaes dome that encloses the aviaries.  Several tiny footbridges arch over the bends of a stream that meanders back and forth alongside the path.  Lush grass and several plantings of green bamboo add to the peaceful atmosphere created by the slow moving water.

Water-smoothed pebbles of all colors are jumbled together to form a path that winds around the glaes dome that encloses the aviaries.  Several tiny footbridges arch over the bends of a stream that meanders back and forth alongside the path.  Filigreed iron lanterns suspended from tall posts reflect gold glimmers off the water, adding to the peaceful atmosphere.
